attributes.action: Petition to stop LHT evicting 23 year old mother of two out of family home.
attributes.additional_details: Petition against Liverpool Housing Trust to stop the eviction of a 23 year old mother of 2 from their family home just 3 months after loosing her father, previous to this she also lost her mother 18 months ago and had no other option than to give her previous home up and move in to give her father 24 hour care.
